news.description: Major telecom providers including AT&T and Comcast have promised not to disconnect small business or residential customers unable to pay for services due to the COVID-19 pandemic.

news.title: How China Built Facial Recognition for People Wearing Masks
news.description: A facial recognition company has developed the ability to identify people wearing masks with up to 95 percent accuracy, with demand for its services growing as coronavirus spreads.

news.title: The Internet is Drowning in COVD-19-Related Malware and Phishing Scams
news.description: The coronavirus pandemic has unleashed a flood of scam emails and websites promoting malware and disinformation to millions under the guise of providing virus-related updates.

news.title: After Dregulatory Blitz, FCC Scrambles to Prevent ISP Abuse During Pandemic
news.description: Following FCC actions to repeal net neutrality and deregulate the broadband industry, the Commission has not persuaded ISP providers to lift data caps during the COVID-19 outbreak.
